titleStmt.title: The Protestant's answer to The Catholick letter to the seeker, or, A vindication of the Protestant's answer, to the seeker's request
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Williams. cf. NUC Pre-1956.
The "Protestant's answer" is Robert Nelson's Transubstantiation contrary to Scripture.
